title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 308: Featuring Brian Burke + Josh Gratton
description:
On episode 308 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets the guys are joined by Brian Burke and Josh Gratton. Burkie joined (02:51) to talk about NHL free agency, why he hates the NHL draft lottery, what needs to be done for next season and tons more. The guys are then joined by Josh Gratton (01:00:12) to talk about his career in the NHL, why he is so tough, post career and a bunch more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
